text: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِي ٱلنَّارِ يَقُولُونَ يَٰلَيۡتَنَآ أَطَعۡنَا ٱللَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَا۠

translation.en: The Day their faces will be turned about in the Fire, they will say, "How we wish we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger
translation.id: Pada hari (ketika) wajah mereka dibolak-balikkan dalam neraka, mereka berkata, "Duhai, kiranya dahulu kami taat kepada Allah dan taat (pula) kepada Rasul
